Name: Citation
Description: A citation for the item. May additionally be rendered in native qualified Dublin Core (dc and dcterms).

Name: LocationInArchive
Description: Describes the location of the item within the archive. Repeat for multiple locations such as separate stores for access and archival copies.

Name: CallNumber
Description: The name, code, or number used by the archive to uniquely identify the item within the archive.

Name: URI
Description: The URL or URN for the item.

Name: Media
Description: Describes the medium, or media, for the item.

Name: StudyClass
Description: An archive specific classification for the item. This may be a topical classification, a classification of intended processing levels, or information on the processing status.

Name: Access
Description: Access restriction information applying to the item. If none are specified the default restrictions of the archive or parent collection or item apply.

Name: OriginalArchiveOrganizationReference
Description: The original archive for the described item, expressed as a reference to an organization listed in the organization scheme.

Name: AvailabilityStatus
Description: A statement of availability for the object. This is a positive statement (as opposed to access restrictions) which may be used for publication or other purposes. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: DataFileQuantity
Description: The number of data files in the described item, expressed as an integer. This is a check sum and should be updated as the contents of the collection changes. The use of this element is best restricted to completed collections where change in the number of objects is not dynamic.

Name: CollectionCompleteness
Description: Describes the completeness of the collection for the item and its related data files and sub-items. Note coverage gaps as well as unique content . This statement may be used for publication or other purposes. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: Item
Description: Allows for the nesting of Item descriptions with a item.
